meanings.definition: To move or adjust something so that it is no longer closed or covered.
meanings.sent1: She opens the door to let the sunlight in.
meanings.sent2: The store opens at 9 a.m. every day.
meanings.sent3: The magician opens the box to reveal a surprise inside.
meanings.sent4: His smile opens a door to her heart.
meanings.sent5: The key opens the lock with a satisfying click.

meanings.definition: To become available or accessible for use or viewing.
meanings.sent1: The new movie opens in theaters next week.
meanings.sent2: The website opens to a homepage with a welcome message.
meanings.sent3: The book opens a world of adventure for young readers.
meanings.sent4: The flower opens its petals to the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The museum opens its doors to visitors from all over the world.

meanings.sent1: He opens the meeting with a warm welcome to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The singer opens the concert with her latest hit song.
meanings.sent3: The chef opens a new restaurant in the heart of the city.
meanings.sent4: The teacher opens the class with an interesting question.
meanings.sent5: The artist opens a new chapter in his creative journey.
